content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** **there s a pdf pattern in english which provides an easy to follow step-by-step crochet instructions and a detailed photo tutorial** about the pattern this beautiful and unique granny square pattern is made with my waves of grain stitch pattern which creates a lovely crochet wheat stitch you can use this granny square crochet pattern to make small squares or work the pattern as big as you d like for a big granny square blanket skill level - intermediate crochet terminology - the pattern is written using english u s terminology materials needed - optional - hooks size needed 5 0 mm / h - the square was crocheted with worsted #4 weight yarn although it can be made with any yarn weight and a suitable hook - total amount of yarn needed for 1 square 100gr / 200m / 218yds - total amount of yarn needed for 35 in 89 cm blanket 600gr / 1200m / 1308yds finished size - 35x35 in 89x89 cm - can be made bigger if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
